Description_lang: Engulf yourself in flames, $?a320364 [instantly causing $258921s1 $@spelldesc1224451 damage to enemies within $258921A1 yards and ][]radiating ${$258922s1*$d} $@spelldesc1224451 damage over $d.$?s320374[|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $<havocTalentFury> Fury over $d.|r][]$?(s212612 & !s320374)[|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $<havocFury> Fury.|r][]$?s212613[|cFFFFFFFFGenerates $<vengeFury> Fury over $d.|r][]
AuraDescription_lang: Burning nearby enemies for $258922s1 $@spelldesc395020 damage every $t1 sec.$?a207548[Movement speed increased by $w4%.][]$?a320331[Armor increased by $w5%. Attackers suffer $@spelldesc395020 damage.][]

description_blz.en_US: Engulf yourself in flames, radiating 393 Fire damage over 6 sec.
description_blz.es_MX: Te envuelves en llamas e irradias 395 p. de daño de fuego durante 6 s.
description_blz.pt_BR: Envolve você em chamas, irradiando 394 de dano com Fogo ao longo de 6 s.
description_blz.de_DE: Hüllt Euch in Flammen, die im Verlauf von 6 Sek. 397 Feuerschaden ausstrahlen.
description_blz.en_GB: Engulf yourself in flames, radiating 387 Fire damage over 6 sec.
description_blz.es_ES: Te envuelve en unas llamas que irradian 394 p. de daño de caos durante 6 s.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vous vous enveloppez de flammes qui infligent 390 points de dégâts de feu en 6 s.
description_blz.it_IT: Un involucro di fiamme irradia 390 danni da fuoco in 6 s.
description_blz.ru_RU: Окутывает вас пламенем, которое наносит противникам 396 ед. урона от огня за 6 сек.
description_blz.ko_KR: 자신의 몸을 불길로 뒤덮어 열기를 내뿜어 1초마다 385의 화염 피해를 입힙니다. 6초 동안 지속됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 以烈焰包覆全身，在6秒內散發391點火焰傷害。
description_blz.zh_CN: 将自身包裹在烈焰中，在6秒内辐射388点火焰伤害。
